name: Keep moving cargo around and no planet will explode
name_original: Keep moving cargo around and no planet will explode
description:
The galaxy needs your help!

Planets are producing so much and if they don't offload to other planets they'll explode! But if they import too much of the resource they want they'll explode too!

Keep moving resources around to save the planets! For profit!

Controls

  • To move a cargoship to a planet, select a cargoship and a planet
  • Select a cargoship either by clicking on the ship or their button on the right side panel
  • Select a planet either by clicking on the planet or their button on the left side panel

Unlock the 2nd cargoship to move resources around faster and upgrade your cargoships to increase their cargo capacity.
